post_content:
Have the following cards available. Photo of backs not loading for some reason. PM/email me for that. Venmo preferred. PayPal G&S add $1.50 each card. Shipping in padded envelope add $4. If buying all, shipping included.

Carr P350 $28. Creases but clean back.
Casey SC350.30 $25. Crease. Toned back w/pencil.
Covaleski SC350.30 $22. Old stain. Paper loss over ‘al’ in Caporal and ‘tte’ in Cigarettes into frame.
Moeller P350 $35. Crease across top of hair. Clean back.
Mullin (batting) SC350.25 $32. Some skinning that affects the bottom of ‘Caporal’ and the top of ‘the standard’.

Take all five for $125.

ALL SOLD. Thanks.
